analyzed: prajāpateḥ visrastasya agram rasaḥ gacat

analyzed: mā imutra ekam tat āhariṣyāmi iti evam

analyzed: yat mahāvratam tat asmin sarvaiḥ sāmabhiḥ rasam dadhāti tasmin hotā mahatā ukthena

analyzed: dadhāti

analyzed: mithunena ātmanā etam mithunam agnim apyeti

analyzed: vā abhyāpayan te etām ṛcam apaśyan dhāmacat agniḥ indraḥ brahmā devaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ

original: sacetaso viśve devā yajñam prāvantu naḥ śubha iti 10.1.3.[9]
analyzed: sacetasaḥ viśve devāḥ yajñam prāvantu naḥ śubhe iti

original: tasyā astyevāgneyam astyaindramasti vaiśvadevaṃ tadyadasyā āgneyaṃ
analyzed: tasyāḥ asti eva āgneyam asti aindram asti vaiśvadevam tat yat asyāḥ āgneyam

original: yadevaitasyāgnerāgneyaṃ tadasya tena samaskurvanyadaindraṃ tadaindreṇa
analyzed: yat eva etasya agneḥ āgneyam tat asya tena samaskurvan yat aindram tat aindreṇa

original: yadvaiśvadevaṃ tadvaiśvadevena tamatraiva sarvaṃ kṛtsnaṃ samaskurvan 10.1.3.[10]
analyzed: yat vaiśvadevam tat vaiśvadevena tam atra eva sarvam kṛtsnam samaskurvan

original: tadyadetayopatiṣṭhate yadevāsyātra vidvānvāvidvānvāti vā recayati na vābhyāpayati
analyzed: tat yat etayā upatiṣṭhate yat eva asya atra vidvān vā a vidvān vā ati vā recayati na vā abhyāpayati

original: tadevāsyaitayā sarvamāpnoti yadasya kiṃ cānāptamanuṣṭubdhāmacadbhavati vāgvā
analyzed: tat eva asya etayā sarvam āpnoti yat asya kim ca an āptam anuṣṭubh dhāma cad bhavati vāc vā

original: anuṣṭubvāgdhāmacadvācaivāsya tadāpnoti yadasya kiṃ cānāptam purīṣavatīṃ citiṃ
analyzed: anuṣṭubh vāc dhāmacat vācā eva asya tat āpnoti yat asya kim ca an āptam purīṣavatīm citim

original: kṛtvopatiṣṭhetetyu haika āhustatra hisā sarvā kṛtsnā bhavatīti 10.1.3.[11]
analyzed: kṛtvā upatiṣṭheta iti u ha eke āhuḥ tatra hisā sarvā kṛtsnā bhavati iti

original: tadu vā āhuḥ yaviṣṭhavatyaivopatiṣṭhetaitaddhāsya priyaṃ dhāma yadyaviṣṭha iti
analyzed: tat u vai āhuḥ yaviṣṭhavatyā eva upatiṣṭheta etat ha asya priyam dhāma yat yaviṣṭhaḥ iti

original: tadyadasya priyaṃ dhāma tenāsya tadāpnoti yadasya kiṃ cānāptamāgneyyāgnikarma
analyzed: tat yat asya priyam dhāma tena asya tat āpnoti yat asya kim ca an āptam āgneyyā agnikarma

original: hi gāyatryāgāyatro'gniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā tāvataivasya ta dāpnoti yadasya
analyzed: hi gāyatryā a gāyatrā ugniḥ yāvān agniḥ yāvatī asya mātrā tāvatā eva asya ta dāpnoti yat asya

original: kiṃ cānāptamaniruktayā sarvaṃ vā aniruktaṃ sarveṇaivāsya tadāpnoti yadasya kiṃ
analyzed: kim ca an āptam aniruktayā sarvam vai aniruktam sarveṇa eva asya tat āpnoti yat asya kim

original: cānāptaṃ tvaṃ yaviṣṭha dāśuṣa iti tasyokto bandhuḥ purīṣavatīṃ citiṃ
analyzed: ca an āptam tvam yaviṣṭha dāśuṣe iti tasya uktaḥ bandhuḥ purīṣavatīm citim

original: kṛtvopatiṣṭheta tatra hi sā sarvā kṛtsnā bhavati 10.1.4.[1]
analyzed: kṛtvā upatiṣṭheta tatra hi sā sarvā kṛtsnā bhavati

original: ubhayaṃ haitadagre prajāpatirāsa martyaṃ caivāmṛtaṃ ca tasya prāṇā evāmṛtā āsuḥ
analyzed: ubhayam ha etat agre prajāpatiḥ āsa martyam ca eva amṛtam ca tasya prāṇāḥ eva amṛtāḥ āsuḥ

original: śarīram martyaṃ sa etena karmaṇaitayāvṛtaikadhājaramamṛtamātmānamakuruta
analyzed: śarīram martyam saḥ etena karmaṇā etayā āvṛtā ekadhā ajaram amṛtam ātmānam akuruta

original: tathaivaitadyajamāna ubhayameva bhavati martyaṃ caivāmṛtaṃ ca tasya prāṇā evāmṛtā
analyzed: tathā eva etat yajamānaḥ ubhayam eva bhavati martyam ca eva amṛtam ca tasya prāṇāḥ eva amṛtā

original: bhavanti śarīram martyaṃ sa etena karmaṇaitayāvṛtaikadhājaramamṛtamātmānaṃ
analyzed: bhavanti śarīram martyam saḥ etena karmaṇā etayā āvṛtā ekadhā ajaram amṛtam ātmānam
kurute

original: sa prathamāṃ citiṃ cinoti sā hāsyaiṣā prāṇa eva tadvai tadamṛtamṛtaṃ hi prāṇaḥ
analyzed: sa prathamām citim cinoti sā ha asya eṣā prāṇaḥ eva tat vai tat amṛtam ṛtam hi prāṇaḥ

original: saiṣāmṛtacitiratha purīṣaṃ nivapati taddhāsyaitanmajjaiva tadvai tanmartyam
analyzed: sā eṣā amṛta citiḥ atha purīṣam nivapati tat ha asya etat majjā eva tat vai tat martyam

original: martyo hi majjā tadetasminnamṛte pratiṣṭhāpayati tenāsyaitadamṛtam bhavati 10.1.4.[3]
analyzed: martyaḥ hi majjā tat etasmin amṛte pratiṣṭhāpayati tena asya etat amṛtam bhavati

original: dvitīyāṃ citiṃ cinoti sā hāsyaiṣāpāna eva tadvai tadamṛtamamṛtaṃ hyapānaḥ
analyzed: dvitīyām citim cinoti sā ha asya eṣā apānaḥ eva tat vai tat amṛtam amṛtam hi apānaḥ

original: saiṣāmṛtacitistadetanmartyamubhayato'mṛtena parigṛhṇāti tenāsyaitadamṛtam
analyzed: sā eṣā amṛta citiḥ tat etat martyam ubhayatas mṛtena parigṛhṇāti tena asya etat amṛtam

original: bhavatyatha purīṣaṃ nivapati taddhāsyaitadasthyeva tadvai tanmartyam martyaṃ
analyzed: bhavati atha purīṣam nivapati tat ha asya etat asthi eva tat vai tat martyam martyam

original: hyasthi tadetasminnamṛte pratiṣṭhāpayati tenāsyaitadamṛtam bhavati 10.1.4.[4]
analyzed: hi asthi tat etasmin amṛte pratiṣṭhāpayati tena asya etat amṛtam bhavati

original: tṛtīyāṃ citiṃ cinoti sā hāsyaiṣā vyāna eva tadvai tadamṛtamamṛtaṃ hi vyānaḥ
analyzed: tṛtīyām citim cinoti sā ha asya eṣā vyānaḥ eva tat vai tat amṛtam amṛtam hi vyānaḥ

original: saiṣāmṛtacitistadetanmartyamubhayato'mṛtena parigṛhṇāti tenāsyaitadamṛtam
analyzed: sā eṣā amṛta citiḥ tat etat martyam ubhayatas mṛtena parigṛhṇāti tena asya etat amṛtam

original: bhavatyatha purīṣaṃ nivapati taddhāsyaitatsnāvaiva tadvai tanmartyaṃ hi snāva
analyzed: bhavati atha purīṣam nivapati tat ha asya etat snāva eva tat vai tat martyam hi snāva

original: tadetasminnamṛte pratiṣṭhāpayati tenāsyaitadamṛtam bhavati 10.1.4.[5]
analyzed: tat etasmin amṛte pratiṣṭhāpayati tena asya etat amṛtam bhavati

original: caturthīṃ citiṃ cinoti sā hāsyaiṣodāna eva tadvai tadamṛtamamṛtam hyudānaḥ
analyzed: caturthīm citim cinoti sā ha asya eṣā udānaḥ eva tat vai tat amṛtam amṛtam hi udānaḥ

original: saiṣāmṛtacitistadetanmartyamubhayato'mṛtena parigṛhṇāti tenāsyaitadamṛtam
analyzed: sā eṣā amṛta citiḥ tat etat martyam ubhayatas mṛtena parigṛhṇāti tena asya etat amṛtam

original: bhavatyatha purīṣaṃ nivapati taddhāsyaitanmāṃsameva tadvai tanmartyam martyaṃ
analyzed: bhavati atha purīṣam nivapati tat ha asya etat māṃsam eva tat vai tat martyam martyam

original: hi māṃsaṃ tadetasminnamṛte pratiṣṭhāpayati tenāsyaitadamṛtam bhavati 10.1.4.[6]
analyzed: hi māṃsam tat etasmin amṛte pratiṣṭhāpayati tena asya etat amṛtam bhavati

original: pañcamīṃ citiṃ cinoti sā hāsyaiṣā samāna eva tadvai tadamṛtamamṛtaṃ hi samānaḥ
analyzed: pañcamīm citim cinoti sā ha asya eṣā samānaḥ eva tat vai tat amṛtam amṛtam hi samānaḥ

original: saiṣāmṛtacitistadetanmartyamubhayato'mṛtena parigṛhṇāti tenāsyaitadamṛtam
analyzed: sā eṣā amṛta citiḥ tat etat martyam ubhayatas mṛtena parigṛhṇāti tena asya etat amṛtam

original: bhavatyatha purīṣaṃ nivapati taddhāsyaitanmeda eva tadvai tanmartyam martyaṃ hi
analyzed: bhavati atha purīṣam nivapati tat ha asya etat medaḥ eva tat vai tat martyam martyam hi

original: medastadetasminnamṛte pratiṣṭhāpayati tenāsyaitadamṛtam bhavati 10.1.4.[7]
analyzed: medaḥ tat etasmin amṛte pratiṣṭhāpayati tena asya etat amṛtam bhavati

original: bhavatyatha puriṣaṃ nivapati taddhāsyaitadasṛgeva tvageva tadvai tanmartyam

original: martyaṃ hyasṛṅmartyā tvaktadetasminnamṛte pratiṣṭhāpayati tenāsyaitadamṛtam

original: bhavati 10.1.4.[8]
analyzed: bhavati

original: tā vā etāḥ ṣaḍiṣṭakācitayaḥ ṣaṭ purīṣacitayastaddvādaśa dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
analyzed: tāḥ vai etāḥ ṣaḍ iṣṭakā citayaḥ ṣaḍ purīṣa citayaḥ tat dvādaśa dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ

original: saṃvatsaro'gniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā tāvataiva

original: tatprajāpatirekadhājaramamṛtamātmānamakuruta tathaivaitadyajamāna
analyzed: tat prajāpatiḥ ekadhā ajaram amṛtam ātmānam akuruta tathā eva etat yajamāna

original: ekadhājaramamṛtamātmānaṃ kurute 10.1.4.[9]
analyzed: ekadhā ajaram amṛtam ātmānam kurute

original: atha vikarṇīṃ ca svayamātṛṇāṃ copadhāya hiraṇyaśakalaiḥ

original: prokṣatyagnimabhyādadhāti rūpameva tatprajāpatirhiraṇmayamantata ātmano'kuruta

original: tadyadantatastasmādidamantyamātmano rūpaṃ tasmādāhurhiraṇmayaḥ prajāpatiriti

original: tathaivaitadyajamāno rūpameva hiraṇmayamantata ātmanaḥ kurute
analyzed: tathā eva etat yajamānaḥ rūpam eva hiraṇmayam antatas ātmanaḥ kurute

original: tadyadantatastasmādidamantyamātmano rūpaṃ tasmādye caitadvidurye ca na
analyzed: tat yat antatas tasmāt idam antyam ātmanaḥ rūpam tasmāt ye ca etat viduḥ ye ca na

original: hiraṇmayo'gnicidamuṣmiṃloke sambhavatītyevāhuḥ 10.1.4.[10]
analyzed: hiraṇmaya ugni cit amuṣmin loke sambhavati iti eva āhuḥ

original: taddhaitacāṇḍilyaśca sāptarathavāhaniśca ācāryāntevāsibau vyūdāte
analyzed: tat ha aitacāṇḍilyaḥ ca sāptarathavāhaniḥ ca ācārya antevāsibau vyūdāte

original: rūpamevāsyaitaditi ha smāha śāṇḍilyo lomānīti sāptarathavāhaniḥ 10.1.4.[11]
analyzed: rūpam eva asya etat iti ha sma āha śāṇḍilyaḥ lomāni iti sāptarathavāhaniḥ

original: sa hovāca śāṇḍilyaḥ rūpaṃ vāva lomavadrūpamalomakaṃ rūpamevāsyaitaditi tadvai
analyzed: sa ha uvāca śāṇḍilyaḥ rūpam vāva lomavat rūpam alomakam rūpam eva asya etat iti tat vai

original: tattathā yathā tacāṇḍilya uvāca saṃcite'gniḥ praṇīyate praṇītādūrdhvaṃ samidha
analyzed: tat tathā yathā tat cāṇḍilyaḥ uvāca saṃcita igniḥ praṇīyate praṇītāt ūrdhvam samidha

original: āhutaya iti hūyante 10.1.4.[12]
analyzed: āhutayaḥ iti hūyante

analyzed: prāṇena vai devāḥ annam adanti agniḥ u devānām prāṇaḥ tasmāt prāk devebhyaḥ juhvati

original: prāṇena hi devā annamadantyapānena manuṣyā annamadanti
analyzed: prāṇena hi devāḥ annam adanti apānena manuṣyāḥ annam adanti

original: tasmātpratyaṅmanuṣyeṣvannaṃ dhīyate'pānena hi manuṣyā annamadanti 10.1.4.[13]
analyzed: tasmāt pratyak manuṣyeṣu annam dhīyate īpānena hi manuṣyāḥ annam adanti

original: tadāhuḥ na vayaso'gnicidaśnīyādvayo vā eṣa rūpam bhavati yo'gniṃ cinuta īśvara

original: eṣa rūpam bhavati yo'gniṃ cinute sarvaṃ vā idamagnerannaṃ sarvam ma

original: idamannamityevaivaṃvidvidyāditi 10.1.4.[14]
analyzed: idam annam iti eva evaṃvid vidyāt iti

original: tadāhuḥ kiṃ tadagnau kriyate yena yajamānaḥ punarmṛtyumapajayatītyagnirvā eṣa

original: devatā bhavati yo'gniṃ cinute'mṛtamu vā agniḥ śrīrdevāḥ śriyaṃ gacati yaśo devā yaśo

original: ha bhavati ya evaṃ veda 10.1.5.[1]

original: sarve haite yajñā yo'yamagniścitaḥ sa yatpaśumālabhate tadagnyādheyamatha

original: samānena hi mantreṇāgnihotrāhutī juhvatyatha yadvanīvāhanaṃ ca

original: bhasmanaścābhyavaharaṇaṃ tau darśapūrṇamāsāvatha yadgārhapatyaṃ cinoti tāni

analyzed: sarvauṣadhāt prācīnam citibhyaḥ te paśubandhāḥ ye eva eteṣu yajñeṣu viṣṇukramāḥ te

analyzed: viṣṇukramāḥ yat japyam tat vātsapram

analyzed: saumyā udhvaraḥ prathamā citiḥ yat prācīnam savebhyaḥ rājasūyaḥ dvitīyā

original: vājapeyastṛtīyāśvamedhaścaturthyagnisavaḥ pañcamī yaiścitaṃ sāmabhiḥ parigāyati

original: tanmahāvratamatha yattatrodgātuḥ purastājjapyaṃ tacatarudriyaṃ vasordhārā
analyzed: tat mahāvratam atha yat tatra udgātuḥ purastāt japyam tacatarudriyam vasordhārā

original: yajñāstānagnināpnoti 10.1.5.[4]
analyzed: yajñāḥ tān agninā āpnoti

original: ha tasminyajña ūrgardhamāse'rdhamāse darśapūrṇamāsayājī caturṣu-caturṣu

original: māseṣu cāturmāsyayājī ṣaṭsu-ṣaṭsu paśubandhayājī saṃvatsare-saṃvatsare somayājī
analyzed: māseṣu cāturmāsya yājī ṣaṭsu ṣaṭsu paśubandha yājī saṃvatsare saṃvatsare soma yājī

analyzed: saṃvatsarāḥ tāvat amṛtam anantam aparyantam sa saḥ ha etat evam veda evam

original: haivāsyaitadamṛtamanantamaparyantam bhavati tasya
analyzed: ha eva asya etat amṛtam anantam aparyantam bhavati tasya

original: yadapīṣīkayevopahanyāttadevāsyāmṛtamanantamaparyantam bhavati 10.2.1.[1]

original: prajāpatiḥ svargaṃ lokamajigāṃsat sarve vai paśavaḥ prajāpatiḥ puruṣo'śvo
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ svargam lokam ajigāṃsat sarve vai paśavaḥ prajāpatiḥ puruṣośvaḥ

original: gauravirajaḥ sa etai rūpairnāśaknotsa etaṃ vayovidhamātmānamapaśyadagniṃ taṃ

analyzed: kanīyaḥ karoti

analyzed: pucādṛjūni lomāni tāni tat karoti

analyzed: dadhāti

analyzed: māseṣu kāmaḥ saptasu ṛtuṣu tat yāvān trayodaśasu māseṣu kāmaḥ saptasu ṛtuṣu tam

original: tatsarvamātmānamabhisaṃcinute 10.2.5.[16]
analyzed: tat sarvam ātmānam abhisaṃcinute

analyzed: ṣaṣṭiḥ māsasya ahar rātrāṇi māsi vai saṃvatsarasya ahar rātrāṇi āpyante

analyzed: eva ekaśatatamī vidhā

analyzed: saḥ ṛtubhiḥ eva saptavidhaḥ ṣaṭ ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ eva saptamī vidhā tasya etasya

analyzed: saṃvatsarasya etat tejaḥ yaḥ eṣa tapati tasya raśmayaḥ śatam vidhā

original: maṇḍalamevaikaśatatamī vidhā 10.2.6.[3]
analyzed: maṇḍalam eva ekaśatatamī vidhā

analyzed: ye pratīcyām sā ekā yāḥ udīcyām sā ekā yāḥ ūrdhvāyām sā ekā yevācyām sā ekā maṇḍalam eva

original: saptamī vidhā 10.2.6.[4]
analyzed: saptamī vidhā

original: tasyaitasya purastātkāmapro lokaḥ amṛtaṃ vai kāmapramamṛtamevāsya
analyzed: tasya etasya purastāt kāmapraḥ lokaḥ amṛtam vai kāmapram amṛtam eva asya

original: tatparastāttadyattadamṛtametattadyadetadarcirdīpyate 10.2.6.[5]
analyzed: tat parastāt tat yat tat amṛtam etat tat yat etat arciḥ dīpyate

original: tadetadvasucitraṃ rādhaḥ tadeṣa savitā vibhaktābhyaḥ prajābhyo
analyzed: tat etat vasu citram rādhaḥ tat eṣa savitā vibhaktā ābhyaḥ prajābhyaḥ

analyzed: vibhajati api oṣadhibhyaḥ api vanaspatibhyaḥ bhūya eva ha tu ekābhyaḥ prayacati kanīya

original: kanīyastāḥ 10.2.6.[6]
analyzed: kanīyastāḥ

original: tadetadṛcābhyuktaṃ vibhaktāraṃ havāmahe vasościtrasya rādhasaḥ savitāraṃ
analyzed: tat etat ṛcā abhyuktam vibhaktāram havāmahe vasoḥ citrasya rādhasaḥ savitāram

original: nṛcakṣasamiti tadetatsarvamāyurdīrghamanantaṃ hi tadyadidamāhurdīrghaṃ ta

original: paśyantī vāgvadati tadetadekaśatavidhena vaivāptavyaṃ śatāyutayā vā ya
analyzed: paśyantī vāc vadati tat etat ekaśatavidhena vā eva āptavyam śata āyu tayā vā

original: evaikaśatavidhaṃ vidhatte yo vā śatam- varṣāṇi jīvati sa haivaitadamṛtamāpnoti
analyzed: eva ekaśatavidham vidhatte yaḥ vā śatam varṣāṇi jīvati sa ha eva etat amṛtam āpnoti

original: tasmādye caitadvidurye ca na lokyā śatāyutetyevāhustasmādu ha na purāyuṣaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt ye ca etat viduḥ ye ca na lokyā śata āyu tā iti eva āhuḥ tasmāt u ha na purā āyuṣaḥ

original: svakāmī preyādalokyaṃ haita u vāva lokā yadahorātrāṇyardhamāsā māsā ṛtavaḥ
analyzed: sva kāmī preyāt alokyam ha ete u vāva lokāḥ yat ahar rātrāṇi ardha māsāḥ māsāḥ ṛtavaḥ

original: saṃvatsaraḥ 10.2.6.[8]
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ

original: tadye'rvāgviṃśeṣu varṣeṣu prayanti ahorātreṣu te lokeṣu sajyante'tha ye
analyzed: tat ye rvāc viṃśeṣu varṣeṣu prayanti ahar rātreṣu te lokeṣu ye

original: te'tha ye paro'śīteṣvarvākśateṣu saṃvatsare te'tha ya eva śataṃ varṣāṇi yo vā

original: bhūyāṃsi jīvati sa haivaitadamṛtamāpnoti 10.2.6.[9]
analyzed: bhūyāṃsi jīvati sa ha eva etat amṛtam āpnoti

original: bahubhirha vai yajñaiḥ ekamaharekā rātrirmitā sa ya evaikaśatavidhaṃ vidhatte yo

original: vidhā atha yā etadantareṇeṣṭakā upadhīyante saivaikaśatatamī vidhā 10.2.6.[12]

original: ekaśatavidhe sapt/
analyzed: ekaśatavidhe sapta

original: vidhena haiva tamevaṃvidāpnoti 10.2.6.[13]
analyzed: vidhena ha eva tam evaṃvidā āpnoti

original: yajñena haiva tamevaṃvidāpnotītyu evādhiyajñam 10.2.6.[14]

original: athādhyātmam pañcemāścaturvidhā aṅgulayo dve kalkuṣī doraṃsaphalakaṃ

original: vidhoktaṃ saptavidhatāyai 10.2.6.[15]
analyzed: vidhā uktam saptavidha tāyai

analyzed: śata āyu tāyām

original: kāmo ya ekaśatavidhe yaḥ saptavidhe yaḥ sarveṣu yajñeṣu vidyāyā haiva
analyzed: kāmaḥ yaḥ ekaśatavidhe yaḥ saptavidhe yaḥ sarveṣu yajñeṣu vidyāyāḥ ha eva

analyzed: tam evaṃvidā āpnoti sarvauḥ hi yajñaiḥ ātmānam sampannam vide

original: śrīḥ śriyāṃ haitadrātryāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni
analyzed: śrīḥ śriyām ha etat rātryām sarvāṇi bhūtāni

original: saṃvasantyaharjyotirādityo'mṛtamityadhidevataṃ 10.2.6.[17]

analyzed: tat hi ādityasya rūpam iti u eva adhiyajñam

analyzed: pariśritām rūpam majjānaḥ jyotiḥ tat hi yajuṣmatīnām rūpam prāṇaḥ umṛtam tat hi agne

original: prajananaḥ prāṇa eṣa triṣṭubatha yo'yamavāṅ prāṇa eṣa jagatī tāni vā etāni sapta

analyzed: cakṣuḥ uṣṇih iti tat yaḥ eva cakṣuṣaḥ mahimā yat vīryam tat etat sahasram cakṣuṣa

original: cīyetaitenaivāsya rūpeṇa sahasrameṣa uṣṇihaḥ saṃcito bhavati 10.3.1.[4]

analyzed: prāṇaḥ ca ākāśaḥ ca yat ca jūḥ ca tasmāt yajuḥ prāṇaḥ eva yat prāṇaḥ hi eti

original: annameva yajuḥ annena hi jāyate'nnena javate tadetadyajuranne pratiṣṭhitamannaṃ
analyzed: annam eva yajuḥ annena hi jāyate idnena javate tat etat yajuḥ anne pratiṣṭhitam annam

original: vahati tasmātsamāna eva prāṇe'nyadanyadannaṃ dhīyate 10.3.5.[7]
analyzed: vahati tasmāt samānaḥ eva prāṇenyat anyat annam dhīyate

original: mana eva puraḥ mano hi prathamam prāṇānāṃ cakṣureva caraṇaṃ cakṣuṣā
analyzed: manaḥ eva puras manaḥ hi prathamam prāṇānām cakṣuḥ eva caraṇam cakṣuṣā

original: hyayamātmā carati tadetadyajuḥ sapuraścaraṇamadhidevataṃ cādhyātmaṃ ca
analyzed: hi ayam ātmā carati tat etat yajuḥ sa puraścaraṇam adhidevatam ca adhyātmam ca

original: pratiṣṭhitaṃ sa yo haitadevaṃ yajuḥ sapuraścaraṇamadhidevataṃ cādhyātmaṃ ca
analyzed: pratiṣṭhitam sa yaḥ ha etat evam yajuḥ sa puraścaraṇam adhidevatam ca adhyātmam ca

original: pratiṣṭhitaṃ veda 10.3.5.[8]
analyzed: pratiṣṭhitam veda

original: ariṣṭo haivānārtaḥ svasti yajñasyodṛcamaśnute svānāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ puraetā
analyzed: ariṣṭaḥ ha eva an ārtaḥ svasti yajñasya udṛcam aśnute svānām śreṣṭhaḥ puraetā

original: bhavatyannādo'dhipatirya evaṃ veda 10.3.5.[9]
analyzed: bhavati anna āda odhipatiḥ yaḥ evam veda

original: ya u haivaṃvidaṃ sveṣu pratipratirbubhūṣati na haivālam bhāryebhyo bhavatyatha
analyzed: yaḥ u ha evaṃvidam sveṣu pratipratiḥ bubhūṣati na ha eva alam bhāryebhyaḥ bhavati atha

original: ya evaitamanubhavati yo vai tamanu bhāryānbubhūrṣati sa haivālam bhāryebhyo
analyzed: yaḥ eva etam anubhavati yaḥ vai tam anu bhāryān bubhūrṣati sa ha eva alam bhāryebhyaḥ
bhavati

analyzed: tat etat jyeṣṭham brahma na hi etasmāt kim cana jyāyoḥ asti jyeṣṭhaḥ ha vai śreṣṭhaḥ

original: svānām bhavati ya evaṃ veda 10.3.5.[11]
analyzed: svānām bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: tadetadbrahmāpūrvamaparavat sa yo haitadevam brahmāpūrvamaparavadveda na
analyzed: tat etat brahma apūrvam aparavat sa yaḥ ha etat evam brahma apūrvam aparavat veda na

original: hāsmātkaścana śreyāntmamāneṣu bhavati śreyāṃsaḥ śreyāṃso haivāsmādaparapuruṣā
analyzed: ha asmāt kaścana śreyān mamāneṣu bhavati śreyāṃsaḥ śreyāṃsaḥ ha eva asmāt apara puruṣā

analyzed: tasya vai etasya yajuṣaḥ rasaḥ eva upaniṣad tasmāt yāvat mātreṇa yajuṣā adhvaryuḥ graham

original: gṛhṇāti sa ubhe stutaśastre anuvibhavatyubhe stutaśastre anuvyaśnute
analyzed: gṛhṇāti saḥ ubhe stuta śastre anuvibhavati ubhe stuta śastre anuvyaśnute

original: tasmādyāvanmātra ivānnasya rasaḥ sarvamannamavati sarvamannamanuvyeti 10.3.5.[13]
analyzed: tasmāt yāvat mātraḥ iva annasya rasaḥ sarvam annam avati sarvam annam anuvyeti

analyzed: tṛptiḥ eva asya gatiḥ tasmāt yadā annasya tṛpyati atha sa gataḥ iva manyate ānandaḥ eva asya

analyzed: vijñānam ātma ānanda ātmānaḥ ha eva sarve devāḥ sā ha eṣā eva devānām addhā avidyā sa ha sa

original: na manuṣyo ya evaṃviddevānāṃ haiva sa ekaḥ 10.3.5.[14]
analyzed: na manuṣyaḥ yaḥ evaṃvid devānām ha eva saḥ ekaḥ

original: etaddha sma vai tadvidvānpriyavrato rauhiṇāyana āha vāyuṃ vāntamānandasta
analyzed: etat ha sma vai tad vidvān priyavrataḥ rauhiṇāyanaḥ āha vāyum vāntam ānandaḥ ta

analyzed: ātmā itas vā vā ahitaḥ vā iti sa ha sma tathā eva vāti tasmāt yām

original: deveṣvāśiṣamicedetenaivopatiṣṭhetānando va ātmāsau me kāmaḥ sa me
analyzed: deveṣu āśiṣam icet etena eva upatiṣṭheta ānandaḥ vaḥ ātmā asau me kāmaḥ sa me

analyzed: samṛdhyatām iti sam ha eva asmai sa kāmaḥ ṛdhyate yad kāmaḥ bhavati etām ha vai

original: tṛptimetāṃ gatimetamānandametamātmānamabhisambhavati ya evaṃ veda 10.3.5.[15]
analyzed: tṛptim etām gatim etam ānandam etam ātmānam abhisambhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: tadetadyajurupāṃśvaniruktam prāṇo vai yajurupāṃśvāyatano vai prāṇastadya enaṃ

analyzed: prajāpatim visrastam yatra devāḥ samaskurvan tam ukhāyām yonau

original: bhūtamasiñcanyonirvā ukhā tasmā etatsaṃvatsare'nnaṃ

original: samaskurvanyo'yamagniścitastadātmanā paryadadhustadātmanā
analyzed: samaskurvan yaḥ yam agniḥ citaḥ tad ātmanā paryadadhuḥ tad ātmanā

analyzed: tasmai etat saṃvatsare id nam saṃskaroti yaḥ yam agniḥ citaḥ tat ātmanā paridadhāti

analyzed: yat bhūyaḥ hinasti tat yat kanīyaḥ na tat avati

analyzed: sa tredhā ākhyāyate

analyzed: prajanayitum ekam rūpam ubhau asāva iti tau ekam rūpam ubhau abhavatām

analyzed: tau yau tau indra agnī etau tau rukmaḥ ca puruṣaḥ ca rukmaḥ eva indraḥ puruṣaḥ agniḥ tau

analyzed: tau etau indra agnī eva cinvanti yat hi kim ca aiṣṭakam agniḥ eva tat tasmāt tat agninā

citau

analyzed: atha yaḥ citā igniḥ nidhīyate tat ekam rūpam ubhau bhavataḥ tasmāt tau etena eva

original: sarvo'gnirabhisampadyate saivākṣarasampat 10.4.1.[9]
analyzed: sarvaḥ agniḥ abhisampadyate sā eva akṣara sampad

analyzed: tat ha etat paśyan ṛṣiḥ abhyanūvāda bhūtam bhaviṣyat prastaumi

original: devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyabhisampadyante tadetadbrahma ca kṣatraṃ cāgnireva

analyzed: brahma indraḥ kṣatram indra agnī vai viśve devāḥ viśve devāḥ tat etat brahma

original: kṣatraṃ viṭ 10.4.1.[10]

analyzed: etat ha sma vai tad vidvān cyāparṇaḥ sāyakāyanaḥ āha yat vai me idam karma

original: etaddha vai tacāṇḍilyaḥ vāmakakṣāyaṇāya procyovāca śrīmānyaśasvyannādo

analyzed: saḥ eṣa agniḥ prajāpatiḥ eva te devāḥ etam agnim prajāpatim saṃskṛtya atha asmai

original: tadasmintsarvābhirṛgbhī rasaṃ dadhāti 10.4.1.[14]
analyzed: tat asmin sarvābhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ rasam dadhāti

original: tadavati 10.4.1.[15]

original: sa eṣa evārkaḥ yo'yamagniścitastasyaitadannaṃ kyameṣa mahāvratīyo

original: sāmata eṣa u evoktadannaṃ thaṃ tadukthamṛktastadetadekaṃ sattredhākhyāyate 10.4.1.[16]

analyzed: saḥ eṣa saṃvatsaraḥ prājāpatiḥ agniḥ tasya ardham eva sāvitrāṇi ardham

analyzed: vaiśvakarmaṇāni aṣṭau eva asya kalāḥ sāvitrāṇi aṣṭau vaiśvakarmaṇāni atha

original: yadetadantareṇa karma kriyate sa eva saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiryo vai kalā

original: manuṣyāṇāmakṣaraṃ taddevānām 10.4.1.[17]
analyzed: manuṣyāṇām akṣaram tat devānām

original: tadvai lometi dve akṣare tvagiti dve asṛgiti dve meda iti dve māṃsamiti dve snāveti
analyzed: tat vai loma iti dve akṣare tvac iti dve asṛj iti dve medaḥ iti dve māṃsam iti dve snāva iti

original: dve asthīti dve majjeti dve tāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalā atha ya etadantareṇa prāṇaḥ saṃcarati sa
analyzed: dve asthi iti dve majjā iti dve tāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalāḥ atha yaḥ etad antareṇa prāṇaḥ saṃcarati sa

original: eva saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiḥ 10.4.1.[18]
analyzed: eva saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiḥ

analyzed: dhriyante itha etāḥ eva jagdhvā utkrāmati tasmāt u ha etat aśiśiṣataḥ tṛpram iva bhavati

analyzed: saptadaśam ṛtvijam kurvīta na id atirecayāni iti atha yaḥ eva atra rasaḥ yāḥ āhutayaḥ hūyante

original: tadeva saptadaśamannam 10.4.1.[20]
analyzed: tat eva saptadaśam annam

analyzed: na uyam ahar rātrābhyām āyuṣaḥ ūntam na gacet iti

original: te hocuḥ tebhyo vai nastvameva tadbrūhi yathā te sarvāṇi rūpāṇyupadadhāmeti 10.4.3.[8]

original: sampaśyedyenaiva nirṛtim pāpmānamapahate sa ekādaśaḥ 10.4.3.[23]

analyzed: kṛtsnā bhavati iti

original: yajñe karma kriyate yatkiṃ ca yajñiyaṃ karma śrotreṇaiva teṣu tacrotramayeṣu
analyzed: yajñe karma kriyate yat kim ca yajñiyam karma śrotreṇa eva teṣu tat crotra mayeṣu

original: śrotracitsu śrotramayamakriyata tadyatkiṃ cemāni bhūtāni śrotreṇa śṛṇvanti
analyzed: śrotra citsu śrotra mayam akriyata tat yat kim ca imāni bhūtāni śrotreṇa śṛṇvanti

original: teṣāmeva sā kṛtistānevādadhati tāṃścinvanti teṣu grahāngṛhṇanti teṣu stuvate teṣu
analyzed: teṣām eva sā kṛtiḥ tān eva ādadhati tān cinvanti teṣu grahān gṛhṇanti teṣu stuvate teṣu

original: śaṃsantyetāvatī vai śrotrasya vibhūtiretāvatī visṛṣṭiretāvacrotraṃ ṣaṭtriṃśa 10.5.3.[8]
analyzed: śaṃsanti etāvatī vai śrotrasya vibhūtiḥ etāvatī visṛṣṭiḥ etāvat crotram ṣaṭtriṃśa

original: tacrotraṃ karmāsṛjata tatprāṇānabhisamamūrcadimaṃ
analyzed: tat crotram karma asṛjata tat prāṇān abhisamamūrcat imam

original: saṃdeghamannasaṃdehamakṛtsnaṃ vai karmarte prāṇebhyo'kṛtsnā uvai prāṇā ṛte
analyzed: saṃdegham anna saṃdeham akṛtsnam vai karma ṛte prāṇebhyaḥ ukṛtsnāḥ u vai prāṇāḥ ṛte

original: karmaṇaḥ 10.5.3.[9]
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ

original: tadidaṃ karma sṛṣṭamāvirabubhūṣat niruktataram mūrtataraṃ
analyzed: tat idam karma sṛṣṭam āvirabubhūṣat niruktataram mūrtataram

original: tadātmānamanvaicattattapo'tapyata tatprāmūrcattatṣaṭtriṃśataṃ
analyzed: tat ātmānam anvaicat tat tapaḥ utapyata tat prāmūrcat tat ṣaṭtriṃśatam

original: sahasrāṇyapaśyadātmano'gnīnarkānkarmamayānkarmacitaste karmaṇaivādhīyanta
analyzed: sahasrāṇi apaśyat ātmanaḥ ugnīn arkān karma mayān karma citaḥ te karmaṇā eva ādhīyanta

original: karmaṇācīyanta karmaṇaiṣu grahā agṛhyanta karmaṇāstuvata karmaṇāśaṃsanyatkiṃ
analyzed: karmaṇā acīyanta karmaṇā eṣu grahāḥ agṛhyanta karmaṇā astuvata karmaṇā aśaṃsan yat kim

original: ca yajñe karma kriyate yatkiṃ ca yajñiyaṃ karma karmaṇaiva teṣu tatkarmamayeṣu
analyzed: ca yajñe karma kriyate yat kim ca yajñiyam karma karmaṇā eva teṣu tat karma mayeṣu

original: karmacitsu karmamayamakriyata tadyatkiṃ cemāni bhūtāni karma kurvate teṣāmeva
analyzed: karma citsu karma mayam akriyata tat yat kim ca imāni bhūtāni karma kurvate teṣām eva

original: sā kṛtistānevādadhati tāṃścinvanti teṣu grahāngṛhṇanti teṣu stuvate teṣu
analyzed: sā kṛtiḥ tān eva ādadhati tān cinvanti teṣu grahān gṛhṇanti teṣu stuvate teṣu

original: śaṃsantyetāvatī vai karmaṇo vibhūtiretāvatī visṛṣṭiretāvatkarma ṣaṭtriṃśa 10.5.3.[10]
analyzed: śaṃsanti etāvatī vai karmaṇaḥ vibhūtiḥ etāvatī visṛṣṭiḥ etāvat karma ṣaṭtriṃśa

original: tatkarmāgnimasṛjata āvistarāṃ vā agniḥ karmaṇaḥ karmaṇā hyenaṃ janayanti
analyzed: tat karma agnim asṛjata āvistarām vai agniḥ karmaṇaḥ karmaṇā hi enam janayanti

original: karmaṇendhate 10.5.3.[11]
analyzed: karmaṇā indhate

original: so'yamagniḥ sṛṣṭa āvirabubhūṣat niruktataro mūrtataraḥ sa ātmānamanvaicatsa
analyzed: saḥ ayam agniḥ sṛṣṭaḥ āvirabubhūṣat niruktataraḥ mūrtataraḥ saḥ ātmānam anvaicat sa

original: tapo'tapyata sa prāmūrcatsa ṣaṭtriṃśataṃ
analyzed: tapaḥ utapyata sa prāmūrcat sa ṣaṭtriṃśatam

original: sahasrāṇyapaśyadātmano'gnīnarkānagnimayānagnicitaste'gninaivādhīyantāgninācīyan
analyzed: sahasrāṇi apaśyat ātmanaḥ agnīn arkān agni mayān agni citaḥ te gninā eva adhīyanta agninā acīyan

original: tāgninaiṣu grahā agṛhyantāgnināstuvatāgnināśaṃsanyatkiṃ ca yajñe karma kriyate
analyzed: tā agninā eṣu grahāḥ agṛhyanta agninā astuvata agninā aśaṃsan yat kim ca yajñe karma kriyate

original: yatkiṃ ca yajñiyaṃ karmāgninaiva teṣu tadagnimayeṣvagnicitsvagnimayamakriyata
analyzed: yat kim ca yajñiyam karma agninā eva teṣu tat agni mayeṣu agni citsu agni mayam akriyata

original: tadyatkiṃ cemāni bhūtānyagnimindhate teṣāmeva sā kṛtistānevādadhati tāṃścinvanti
analyzed: tat yat kim ca imāni bhūtāni agnim indhate teṣām eva sā kṛtiḥ tān eva ādadhati tān cinvanti

original: teṣu grahāngṛhṇanti teṣu stuvate teṣu śaṃsantyetāvatī vā agnervibhūtiretāvatī
analyzed: teṣu grahān gṛhṇanti teṣu stuvate teṣu śaṃsanti etāvatī vai agneḥ vibhūtiḥ etāvatī

original: visṛṣṭiretāvānagniḥ ṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇyagnayo=rkāsteṣāmekaika eva tāvānyāvānasau
analyzed: visṛṣṭiḥ etāvān agniḥ ṣaṭtriṃśat sahasrāṇi agnayoḥ ṛkāḥ teṣām ekaikaḥ eva tāvān yāvān asau
pūrvaḥ

original: te haite vidyācita eva tānhaitānevaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni cinvantyapi svapate
analyzed: te ha ete vidyā citaḥ eva tān ha etān evaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni cinvanti api svapate

original: vidyayā haivaita evaṃvidaścitā bhavanti 10.5.4.[1]
analyzed: vidyayā ha eva ete evaṃvidaḥ citāḥ bhavanti

original: ayaṃ vāva loka eṣo'gniścitaḥ tasyāpa eva pariśrito manuṣyā yajuṣmatya iṣṭakāḥ
analyzed: ayam vāva lokaḥ eṣa ugniḥ citaḥ tasya āpaḥ eva pariśritaḥ manuṣyāḥ yajuṣmatyaḥ iṣṭakāḥ

original: sūdadohā oṣadhayaśca vanaspatayaśca purīṣamāhutayaḥ samidho'gnirlokampṛṇā
analyzed: sūdadohāḥ oṣadhayaḥ ca vanaspatayaḥ ca purīṣam āhutayaḥ samidhaḥ agniḥ lokampṛṇā

original: tadvā etatsarvamagnimevābhisampadyate tatsarvo'gnirlokampṛṇāmabhisampadyate sa
analyzed: tat vai etat sarvam agnim eva abhisampadyate tat sarvaḥ agniḥ lokampṛṇām abhisampadyate sa

original: yo haitadevaṃ veda lokampṛṇāmenam bhūtametatsarvamabhisampadyate 10.5.4.[2]
analyzed: yaḥ ha etat evam veda lokampṛṇām enam bhūtam etat sarvam abhisampadyate

original: antarikṣaṃ ha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tasya dyāvāpṛthivyoreva saṃdhiḥ pariśritaḥ pareṇa
analyzed: antarikṣam ha tu eva eṣa ugniḥ citaḥ tasya dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ eva saṃdhiḥ pariśritaḥ pareṇa

original: hāntarikṣaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī saṃdhattastāḥ pariśrito vayāṃsi yajuṣmatya iṣṭakā varṣaṃ
analyzed: ha antarikṣam dyāvāpṛthivī saṃdhattaḥ tāḥ pariśritaḥ vayāṃsi yajuṣmatyaḥ iṣṭakāḥ varṣam

original: sūdadohā marīcayaḥ purīṣamāhutayaḥ samidho vāyurlokampṛṇā tadvā etatsarvaṃ
analyzed: sūdadohāḥ marīcayaḥ purīṣam āhutayaḥ samidhaḥ vāyuḥ lokampṛṇā tat vai etat sarvam

original: vāyumevābhisampadyate tatsarvo'gnirlo 10.5.4.[3]
analyzed: vāyum eva abhisampadyate tat sarvaḥ agniḥ laḥ

original: dyaurha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tasyāpa eva pariśrito yathā ha vā idaṃ kośaḥ samubjita
analyzed: dyauḥ ha tu eva eṣā ugniḥ citaḥ tasya apaḥ eva pariśritaḥ yathā ha vai idam kośaḥ

original: evamime lokā apsvantastadyā imāṃlokānpareṇāpastāḥ pariśrito devā yajuṣmatya
analyzed: evam ime lokāḥ apsu antaḥ tat yāḥ imān lokān pareṇa apaḥ tāḥ pariśritaḥ devāḥ

original: iṣṭakā yadevaitasmiṃloke'nnaṃ tatsūdadohā nakṣatrāṇi purīṣamāhutayaḥ samidha
analyzed: iṣṭakāḥ yat eva etasmin loke innam tat sūdadohāḥ nakṣatrāṇi purīṣam āhutayaḥ samidha

original: ādityo lokampṛṇā tadvā etatsarvamādityamevābhisampadyate tatsarvo'gnirlo 10.5.4.[4]
analyzed: ādityaḥ lokampṛṇā tat vai etat sarvam ādityam eva abhisampadyate tat sarvaḥ agniḥ lo

original: ādityo ha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tasya diśa eva pariśritastāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni
analyzed: ādityaḥ ha tu eva eṣa agniḥ citaḥ tasya diśaḥ eva pariśritaḥ tāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ ca trīṇi ca śatāni

original: bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatānyādityaṃ diśaḥ samantam pariyanti raśmayo
analyzed: bhavanti ṣaṣṭiḥ ca ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni ādityam diśaḥ samantam pariyanti raśmayaḥ

original: yajuṣmatya iṣṭakāstāḥ ṣaṣṭiścaiva trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca
analyzed: yajuṣmatyaḥ iṣṭakāḥ tāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ ca eva trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiḥ ca ha vai trīṇi ca

original: śatānyādityasya raśmayastadyatpariśritsu yajuṣmatīḥ pratyarpayati raśmīṃstaddikṣu
analyzed: śatāni ādityasya raśmayaḥ tat yat pariśritsu yajuṣmatīḥ pratyarpayati raśmīn tat dikṣu

original: pratyarpayatyatha yadantarā diśaśca raśmīṃśca tatsūdadohā atha yaddikṣu ca
analyzed: pratyarpayati atha yat antarā diśaḥ ca raśmīn ca tat sūdadohāḥ atha yat dikṣu ca

original: raśmiṣu cānnaṃ tatpurīṣaṃ tā āhutayastāḥ samidho'tha yaddiśa iti ca raśmaya iti
analyzed: raśmiṣu ca annam tat purīṣam tāḥ āhutayaḥ tāḥ samidhaḥ utha yat diśaḥ iti ca raśmayaḥ iti

original: cākhyāyate tallokampṛṇā tadvā etatsarvaṃ diśa iti caiva raśmaya iti cākhyāyate
analyzed: ca ākhyāyate tat lokampṛṇā tat vai etat sarvam diśaḥ iti ca eva raśmayaḥ iti ca ākhyāyate

original: tatsarvo'gnirlo 10.5.4.[5]
analyzed: tat sarvaḥ agniḥ laḥ

original: nakṣatrāṇi ha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tāni vā etāni saptaviṃśatirnakṣatrāṇi saptaviṃśatiḥ
analyzed: nakṣatrāṇi ha tu eva eṣa agniḥ citaḥ tāni vai etāni saptaviṃśatiḥ nakṣatrāṇi saptaviṃśatiḥ

original: saptaviṃśatirhopanakṣatrāṇyekaikaṃ nakṣatramanūpatiṣṭhante tāni sapta ca śatāni
analyzed: saptaviṃśatiḥ ha upanakṣatrāṇi ekaikam nakṣatram anūpatiṣṭhante tāni sapta ca śatāni

original: viṃśatiścādhi ṣaṭtriṃśattato yāni sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiśceṣṭakā eva tāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca
analyzed: viṃśatiḥ ca adhi ṣaṭtriṃśat tatas yāni sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiḥ ca iṣṭakāḥ eva tāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ ca

original: trīṇi ca śatāni pariśritaḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni yajuṣmatyo'tha yānyadhi
analyzed: trīṇi ca śatāni pariśritaḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ ca trīṇi ca śatāni yajuṣmatyaḥ utha yāni adhi

original: ṣaṭtriṃśatsa trayodaśo māsaḥ sa ātmā triṃśadātmā pratiṣṭhā dve śira eva ṣaṭtriṃśyau
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśat sa trayodaśaḥ māsaḥ saḥ ātmā triṃśat ātmā pratiṣṭhā dve śiraḥ eva ṣaṭtriṃśyau

original: tadyatte dve bhavato dvyakṣaraṃ hi śiro'tha yadantarā nakṣatre tatsūdadohā atha
analyzed: tat yat te dve bhavataḥ dvi akṣaram hi śiraḥ utha yat antarā nakṣatre tat sūdadohāḥ atha

original: yannakṣatreṣvannaṃ tatpurīṣaṃ tā āhutayastāḥ samidho'tha
analyzed: yat nakṣatreṣu annam tat purīṣam tāḥ āhutayaḥ tāḥ samidhaḥ utha

original: yannakṣatrāṇītyākhyāyate tallokampṛṇā tadvā etatsarvaṃnakṣatrāṇītyevākhyāyate
analyzed: yat nakṣatrāṇi iti ākhyāyate tat lokampṛṇā tat vai etat sarvam nakṣatrāṇi iti eva ākhyāyate

original: tatsarvo'gnirlo 10.5.4.[6]
analyzed: tat sarvaḥ agniḥ laḥ

original: tā vā etāḥ ekaviṃśatirbṛhatya ekaviṃśo vai svargo loko bṛhatī svargo lokastadeṣa
analyzed: tāḥ vai etāḥ ekaviṃśatiḥ bṛhatyaḥ ekaviṃśaḥ vai svargaḥ lokaḥ bṛhatī svargaḥ lokaḥ tat eṣa

original: svargaṃ lokamabhisampadyata ekaviṃśaṃ ca stomam bṛhatīṃ ca candaḥ 10.5.4.[7]
analyzed: svargam lokam abhisampadyate ekaviṃśam ca stomam bṛhatīm ca candaḥ

original: candāṃsi ha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tāni vā etāni sapta candāṃsi caturuttarāṇi tricāni teṣāṃ
analyzed: candāṃsi ha tu eva eṣa agniḥ citaḥ tāni vai etāni sapta candāṃsi catur uttarāṇi tricāni teṣām

original: sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiścākṣarāṇyadhi ṣaṭtriṃśattato yāni sapta ca śatāni
analyzed: sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiḥ ca akṣarāṇi adhi ṣaṭtriṃśat tatas yāni sapta ca śatāni

original: viṃśatiśceṣṭakā eva tāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni pariśritaḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni
analyzed: viṃśatiḥ ca iṣṭakāḥ eva tāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ ca trīṇi ca śatāni pariśritaḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ ca trīṇi ca śatāni

original: yajuṣmatyo'tha yānyadhi ṣaṭtriṃśatsa trayodaśo māsaḥ sa ātmā triṃśadātmā
analyzed: yajuṣmatyaḥ utha yāni adhi ṣaṭtriṃśat sa trayodaśaḥ māsaḥ saḥ ātmā triṃśat ātmā

original: pratiṣṭhā dve prāṇā dve śira eva ṣaṭtriṃśyau tadyatte dve bhavato dvyakṣaraṃ hi
analyzed: pratiṣṭhā dve prāṇāḥ dve śiraḥ eva ṣaṭtriṃśyau tat yat te dve bhavataḥ dvi akṣaram hi
śiraḥ

original: tasyai vā etasyai ṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarāyai bṛhatyai yāni daśa prathamānyakṣarāṇi sā
analyzed: tasyai vai etasyai ṣaṭtriṃśat akṣarāyai bṛhatyai yāni daśa prathamāni akṣarāṇi sā

original: daśākṣaraikapadātha yāni viṃśatiḥ sā viṃśatyakṣarā dvipadātha yāni triṃśatsā
analyzed: daśa akṣarā eka padā atha yāni viṃśatiḥ sā viṃśati akṣarā dvi padā atha yāni triṃśat sā

original: triṃśadakṣarā virāḍatha yāni trayastriṃśatsā trayastriṃśadakṣarātha yāni
analyzed: triṃśat akṣarā virāj atha yāni trayastriṃśat sā trayastriṃśat akṣarā atha yāni

original: catustriṃśatsā catustriṃśadakṣarā svarāḍatha
analyzed: catustriṃśat sā catustriṃśat akṣarā svarāj atha

original: yatsarvaiścandobhirayamagniścitastadaticandāstā u sarvā iṣṭakā eveṣṭaketi
analyzed: yat sarvaiḥ candobhiḥ ayam agniḥ citaḥ tat aticandāḥ tāḥ u sarvāḥ iṣṭakāḥ eva iṣṭakā iti

original: trīṇyakṣarāṇi tripadā gāyatrī tenaiṣa gāyatro'gnirmṛdāpa iti trīṇyakṣarāṇi tripadā
analyzed: trīṇi akṣarāṇi tri padā gāyatrī tena eṣa gāyatrā ugniḥ mṛdā apaḥ iti trīṇi akṣarāṇi tri padā

original: gāyatrī teno evaiṣa gāyatro'tha yadantarā candasī tatsūdadohā atha
analyzed: gāyatrī tena u eva eṣa gāyatrā utha yat antarā candasī tat sūdadohāḥ atha

original: yaccandaḥsvannaṃ tatpurīṣaṃ tā āhutayastāḥ samidho'tha yaccandāṃsītyākhyāyate
analyzed: yat candaḥsu annam tat purīṣam tāḥ āhutayaḥ tāḥ samidhaḥ utha yat candāṃsi iti ākhyāyate

original: tallokampṛṇā tadvā etatsarvaṃ candāṃsītyevākhyāyate tatsarvo'gnirlo 10.5.4.[9]
analyzed: tat lokampṛṇā tat vai etat sarvam candāṃsi iti eva ākhyāyate tat sarvaḥ agniḥ laḥ

original: tā vā etāḥ ekaviṃśatirbṛhatya ekaviṃśo vai svargo loko bṛhatī svargo lokastadeṣa
analyzed: tāḥ vai etāḥ ekaviṃśatiḥ bṛhatyaḥ ekaviṃśaḥ vai svargaḥ lokaḥ bṛhatī svargaḥ lokaḥ tat eṣa

original: svargaṃ lokamabhisampadyata ekaviṃśaṃ ca stomam bṛhatīṃ ca candaḥ 10.5.4.[10]
analyzed: svargam lokam abhisampadyate ekaviṃśam ca stomam bṛhatīm ca candaḥ

original: saṃvatsaro ha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tasya rātraya eva pariśritastāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ ha tu eva eṣa agniḥ citaḥ tasya rātrayaḥ eva pariśritaḥ tāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ ca trīṇi ca

original: śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni saṃvatsarasya rātrayo'hāni yajuṣmatya
analyzed: śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiḥ ca ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni saṃvatsarasya rātrayaḥ ūhāni yajuṣmatya

original: iṣṭakāstāḥ ṣaṣṭiścaiva trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni
analyzed: iṣṭakāḥ tāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ ca eva trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiḥ ca ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni

original: saṃvatsarasyāhānyatha yā amūḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadiṣṭakā atiyanti yaḥ sa trayodaśo māsa
analyzed: saṃvatsarasya ahāni atha yāḥ amūḥ ṣaṭtriṃśat iṣṭakāḥ atiyanti yaḥ sa trayodaśaḥ māsa

original: ātmārdhamāsāśca te māsāśca caturviṃśatirardhamāsā dvādaśa māsā atha
analyzed: ātma ardha māsāḥ ca te māsāḥ ca caturviṃśatiḥ ardha māsāḥ dvādaśa māsāḥ atha

original: yadantarāhorātre tatsūdadohā atha yadahorātreṣvannaṃ tatpurīṣaṃ tā āhutayastāḥ
analyzed: yat antarā ahar rātre tat sūdadohāḥ atha yat ahar rātreṣu annam tat purīṣam tāḥ āhutayaḥ tāḥ

original: samidho'tha yadahorātrāṇītyākhyāyate tallokampṛṇā tadvā
analyzed: samidhaḥ utha yat ahar rātrāṇi iti ākhyāyate tat lokampṛṇā tat vā

original: etatsarvamahorātrāṇītyevākhyāyate tatsarvo'gnirlo 10.5.4.[11]
analyzed: etat sarvam ahar rātrāṇi iti eva ākhyāyate tat sarvaḥ agniḥ laḥ

original: tā vā etāḥ ekaviṃśatirbṛhatya ekaviṃśo vai svargo loko bṛhatī svargo lokastadeṣa
analyzed: tāḥ vai etāḥ ekaviṃśatiḥ bṛhatyaḥ ekaviṃśaḥ vai svargaḥ lokaḥ bṛhatī svargaḥ lokaḥ tat eṣa

original: svargaṃ lokamabhisampadyate ekaviṃśaṃ ca stomam bṛhatīṃ ca candaḥ 10.5.4.[12]
analyzed: svargam lokam abhisampadyate ekaviṃśam ca stomam bṛhatīm ca candaḥ

original: ātmā ha tvevaiṣo'gniścitaḥ tasyāsthīnyeva pariśritastāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca trīṇi ca śatāni
analyzed: ātmā ha tu eva eṣa agniḥ citaḥ tasya asthīni eva pariśritaḥ tāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ ca trīṇi ca śatāni

original: bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni puruṣasyāsthīni majjāno yajuṣmatya
analyzed: bhavanti ṣaṣṭiḥ ca ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni puruṣasya asthīni majjānaḥ

analyzed: iṣṭakāḥ tāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ ca eva trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiḥ ca ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni

original: puruṣasya majjāno'tha yā amūḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadiṣṭakā atiyanti yaḥ sa trayodaśo māsa
analyzed: puruṣasya majjānaḥ utha yāḥ amūḥ ṣaṭtriṃśat iṣṭakāḥ atiyanti yaḥ sa trayodaśaḥ māsa

original: ātmā prāṇaḥ sa tasya triṃśadātmanvidhāḥ pratiṣṭhāyāṃ dve śīrṣandve tadyatte dve
analyzed: ātmā prāṇaḥ sa tasya triṃśat ātman vidhāḥ pratiṣṭhāyām dve śīrṣan dve tat yat te dve

original: bhavato dvikapālaṃ hi śiro'tha yenemāni parvāṇi saṃtatāni tatsūdadohā athaitattrayaṃ
analyzed: bhavataḥ dvi kapālam hi śiraḥ utha yena imāni parvāṇi saṃtatāni tat sūdadohāḥ atha etat trayam

original: yenāyamātmā pracanno loma tvaṅmāṃsamiti tatpurīṣaṃ yatpibati tā āhutayo
analyzed: yena ayam ātmā pracannaḥ loma tvac māṃsam iti tat purīṣam yat pibati tāḥ āhutayaḥ

original: yadaśnāti tāḥ samidho'tha yadātmetyākhyāyate tallokampṛṇā tadvā
analyzed: yat aśnāti tāḥ samidhaḥ utha yat ātmā iti ākhyāyate tat lokampṛṇā tat vā

original: etatsarvamātmetyevākhyāyate tatsarvo'gnirlo 10.5.4.[13]
analyzed: etat sarvam ātmā iti eva ākhyāyate tat sarvaḥ agniḥ lo

original: tā vā etāḥ ekaviṃśatirbṛha 10.5.4.[14]
analyzed: tāḥ vai etāḥ ekaviṃśatiḥ bṛha

analyzed: sarvāṇi ha tu eva bhūtāni sarve devāḥ eṣa agniḥ citaḥ āpaḥ vai sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni

original: bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi ca śatānyādityaṃ nāvyāḥ samantam pariyanti nāvyā u
analyzed: bhavanti ṣaṣṭiḥ ca ha vai trīṇi ca śatāni ādityam nāvyāḥ samantam pariyanti nāvyāḥ u

original: eva yajuṣmatya iṣṭakāstāḥ ṣaṣṭiścaiva trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiśca ha vai trīṇi
analyzed: eva yajuṣmatyaḥ iṣṭakāḥ tāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ ca eva trīṇi ca śatāni bhavanti ṣaṣṭiḥ ca ha vai trīṇi

original: ca śatānyādityaṃ nāvyā abhikṣarantyatha yadantarā nāvye tatsūdadohā atha yā amūḥ
analyzed: ca śatāni ādityam nāvye abhikṣaranti atha yat antarā nāvye tat sūdadohāḥ atha yāḥ amūḥ

original: ṣaṭtriṃśadiṣṭakā atiyanti yaḥ sa trayodaśo māsa ātmāyameva sa yo'yaṃ hiraṇmayaḥ
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśat iṣṭakāḥ atiyanti yaḥ sa trayodaśaḥ māsaḥ ātmā ayam eva sa yaḥ yam hiraṇmayaḥ
puruṣaḥ

original: tasyaite pratiṣṭhe rukmaśca puṣkaraparṇaṃ cāpaścādityamaṇḍalaṃ ca srucau bāhū
analyzed: tasya ete pratiṣṭhe rukmaḥ ca puṣkaraparṇam ca apaḥ ca āditya maṇḍalam ca srucau bāhū

original: tāvindrāgnī dve svayamātṛṇe iyaṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca tisro viśvajyotiṣa etā devatā
analyzed: tau indra agnī dve svayamātṛṇe iyam ca antarikṣam ca tisraḥ viśvajyotiṣaḥ etāḥ devatāḥ

analyzed: agniḥ vāyuḥ ādityaḥ etāḥ hi eva devatāḥ viśvam jyotiḥ dvādaśa ṛtavyāḥ sa saṃvatsaraḥ saḥ ātmā

original: pañca pañcacūḍāḥ sa yajñaste devā atha yadvikarṇī ca svayamātṛṇā cāśmā
analyzed: pañca pañcacūḍāḥ sa yajñaḥ te devāḥ atha yat vikarṇī ca svayamātṛṇā ca aśmā

analyzed: pṛśniḥ yaḥ citā igniḥ nidhīyate sā pañcatrīṃśī lokampṛṇāyai yajuḥ ṣaṭtriṃśī saḥ usya eṣa

original: sarvasyāntamevātmā sa eṣa sarvāsāmapām madhye sa eṣa sarvaiḥ kāmaiḥ sampanna
analyzed: sarvasya antam eva ātmā saḥ eṣa sarvāsām apām madhye saḥ eṣa sarvaiḥ kāmaiḥ sampanna

analyzed: tat eṣa ślokaḥ bhavati vidyayā tat ārohanti yatra kāmāḥ parāgatāḥ na tatra dakṣiṇā

analyzed: yanti na a vidvāṃsaḥ tapasvinaḥ iti na ha eva tam lokam dakṣiṇābhiḥ na

analyzed: abhram purīṣam candramāḥ āhutayaḥ nakṣatrāṇi samidhaḥ yat candramāḥ nakṣatre

analyzed: tat vai etat sarvam devāḥ iti eva ākhyāyate

analyzed: devāḥ yajuḥ eva bhavanti tat sarvaḥ agniḥ lokampṛṇām abhisampadyate sa yaḥ ha etat evam

analyzed: veda lokampṛṇām enam bhūtam etat sarvam abhisampadyate

analyzed: kuśriḥ ha vājaśravasaḥ agnim cikye tam ha uvāca suśruvāḥ kauṣyaḥ gautama

original: yadagnimacaiṣīḥ prāñcamenamacaiṣīḥ
analyzed: yat agnim acaiṣīḥ prāñcam enam acaiṣīḥ

analyzed: praticakramire upa tvā ayāma iti

original: yadi ha nāgamiṣya iti vā 10.6.1.[5]
analyzed: yadi ha na āgamiṣyaḥ iti vā

original: vedāpa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyureti vastistvā eṣa vaiśvānarasya
analyzed: veda apa punarmṛtyum jayati sarvam āyuḥ eti vastiḥ tvai eṣa vaiśvānarasya

original: vastistvāhāsyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti vastiste'vidito'bhaviṣyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti
analyzed: vastiḥ tvā ahāsyat yadi ha na āgamiṣyaḥ iti vastiḥ teviditaḥ bhaviṣyat yadi ha na āgamiṣyaḥ iti
vā

original: atha hovāca mahāśālaṃ jābālam aupamanyava kaṃ tvaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ
analyzed: atha ha uvāca mahāśālam jābālam aupamanyava kam tvam vaiśvānaram

original: vetthetyākāśameva rājanniti hovācomiti hovācaiṣa vai bahulo vaiśvānara etaṃ hi vai
analyzed: vettha iti ākāśam eva rājan iti ha uvāca ūm iti ha uvāca eṣa vai bahulaḥ vaiśvānaraḥ etam hi vai

original: tvam bahulaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettha tasmāttvam bahuḥ prajayā paśubhirasi yo vā etam
analyzed: tvam bahulam vaiśvānaram vettha tasmāt tvam bahuḥ prajayā paśubhiḥ asi yaḥ vai etam

original: bahulaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vedāpa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyuretyātmā tvā eṣa
analyzed: bahulam vaiśvānaram veda apa punarmṛtyum jayati sarvam āyuḥ eti ātmā tvai eṣa

original: vaiśvānarasyātmā tvāhāsyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya ityātmā te'vidito'bhaviṣyadyadi ha
analyzed: vaiśvānarasya ātmā tvā ahāsyat yadi ha na āgamiṣyaḥ iti ātmā teviditaḥ bhaviṣyat yadi ha

original: nāgamiṣya iti vā 10.6.1.[7]
analyzed: na āgamiṣye iti vā

original: atha hovāca buḍilamāśvatarāśvim vaiyāghrapadya kaṃ tvaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettheti
analyzed: atha ha uvāca buḍilam āśvatarāśvim vaiyāghrapadya kam tvam vaiśvānaram vettha iti

original: vāyumeva rājanniti hovācomiti hovācaiṣa vai pṛthagvartmā vaiśvānara etaṃ hi vai
analyzed: vāyum eva rājan iti ha uvāca ūm iti ha uvāca eṣa vai pṛthak vartmā vaiśvānaraḥ etam hi vai

original: tvam pṛthagvartmānaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettha tasmāttvām pṛthagrathaśreṇayo'nuyānti yo
analyzed: tvam pṛthak vartmānam vaiśvānaram vettha tasmāt tvām pṛthak ratha śreṇayā unuyānti yaḥ

original: vā etam pṛthagvartmānaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vedāpa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyureti
analyzed: vai etam pṛthak vartmānam vaiśvānaram veda apa punarmṛtyum jayati sarvam āyuḥ eti

original: prāṇastvā eṣa vaiśvānarasya prāṇastvāhāsyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti
analyzed: prāṇaḥ tvai eṣa vaiśvānarasya prāṇaḥ tvā ahāsyat yadi ha na āgamiṣyaḥ iti

original: prāṇaste'vidito'bhaviṣyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti vā 10.6.1.[8]
analyzed: prāṇa ste viditaḥ bhaviṣyat yadi ha na āgamiṣyaḥ iti vā

original: atha hovācendradyumnam bhāllaveyam vaiyāghrapadya kaṃ tvaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ
analyzed: atha ha uvāca indradyumnam bhāllaveyam vaiyāghrapadya kam tvam vaiśvānaram

original: vetthetyādityameva rājanniti hovācomiti hovācaiṣa vai sutatejā vaiśvānara etaṃ hi vai
analyzed: vettha iti ādityam eva rājan iti ha uvāca ūm iti ha uvāca eṣa vai suta tejāḥ vaiśvānaraḥ etam hi vai

original: tvaṃ sutatejasaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettha tasmāttavaiṣa suto'dyamānaḥ
analyzed: tvam suta tejasam vaiśvānaram vettha tasmāt tava eṣa suta udyamānaḥ

original: pacyamāno'kṣīyamāṇo gṛheṣu tiṣṭhati yo vā etaṃ sutatejasaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vedāpa
analyzed: pacyamāna ukṣīyamāṇaḥ gṛheṣu tiṣṭhati yaḥ vai etam suta tejasam vaiśvānaram veda apa

original: punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyureti cakṣustvā etadvaiśvānarasya cakṣustvāhāsyadyadi
analyzed: punarmṛtyum jayati sarvam āyuḥ eti cakṣuḥ tvai etat vaiśvānarasya cakṣuḥ tvā ahāsyat yadi

original: ha nāgamiṣya iti cakṣuste'viditamabhaviṣyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti vā 10.6.1.[9]
analyzed: ha na āgamiṣyaḥ iti cakṣuḥ teviditam abhaviṣyat yadi ha na āgamiṣyaḥ iti vā

original: atha hovāca janaṃ śārkarākṣyam sāyavasa kaṃ tvaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vettheti divameva
analyzed: atha ha uvāca janam śārkarākṣyam sāyavasa kam tvam vaiśvānaram vettha iti divam eva

original: rājanniti hovācomiti hovācaiṣa vā atiṣṭhā vaiśvānara etaṃ hi vai tvamatiṣṭhāṃ
analyzed: rājan iti ha uvāca ūm iti ha uvāca eṣa vai atiṣṭhāḥ vaiśvānaraḥ etam hi vai tvam atiṣṭhām

original: vaiśvānaraṃ vettha tasmāttvaṃ samānānatitiṣṭhasi yo vā etamatiṣṭhāṃ vaiśvānaraṃ
analyzed: vaiśvānaram vettha tasmāt tvam samānān atitiṣṭhasi yaḥ vai etam atiṣṭhām vaiśvānaram

original: vedāpa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyureti mūrdhā tvā eṣa vaiśvānarasya mūrdhā
analyzed: veda apa punarmṛtyum jayati sarvam āyuḥ eti mūrdhā tvai eṣa vaiśvānarasya mūrdhā

original: tvāhāsyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti mūrdhā te'vidito'bhaviṣyadyadi ha nāgamiṣya iti vā 10.6.1.[10]
analyzed: tvā ahāsyat yadi ha na āgamiṣyaḥ iti mūrdhā teviditaḥ bhaviṣyat yadi ha na āgamiṣyaḥ iti vā

original: tānhovāca ete vai yūyam pṛthagvaiśvānarānvidvāṃsaḥ pṛthagannamaghasta
analyzed: tān ha uvāca ete vai yūyam pṛthak vaiśvānarān vidvāṃsaḥ pṛthak annam aghasta

original: prādeśamātramiva ha vai devāḥ suviditā abhisampannāstathā tu va enānvakṣyāmi
analyzed: prādeśa mātram iva ha vai devāḥ su viditāḥ abhisampannāḥ tathā tu vaḥ enā anvakṣyāmi

original: yathā prādeśamātramevābhisampādayiṣyāmīti 10.6.1.[11]
analyzed: yathā prādeśa mātram eva abhisampādayiṣyāmi iti

original: sa hovāca mūrdhānamupadiśanneṣa vā atiṣṭhā vaiśvānara iti cakṣuṣī
analyzed: sa ha uvāca mūrdhānam upadiśan eṣa vai atiṣṭhāḥ vaiśvānaraḥ iti cakṣuṣī

original: upadiśannuvācaiṣa vai sutatejā vaiśvānara iti nāsike upadiśannuvācaiṣa vai
analyzed: upadiśan uvāca eṣa vai suta tejāḥ vaiśvānaraḥ iti nāsike upadiśan uvāca eṣa vai

original: pṛthagvartmā vaiśvānara iti mukhyamākāśamupadiśannuvācaiṣa vai bahulo
analyzed: pṛthak vartmā vaiśvānaraḥ iti mukhyam ākāśam upadiśan uvāca eṣa vai bahulaḥ

original: vaiśvānara iti mukhyā apa upadiśannuvācaiṣa vai rayirvaiśvānaro iti
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ iti mukhyāḥ apaḥ upadiśan uvāca eṣa vai rayiḥ vaiśvānaraḥ iti

original: cubukamupadiśannuvācaiṣa vai pratiṣṭhā vaiśvānara iti sa eṣo'gnirvaiśvānaro
analyzed: cubukam upadiśan uvāca eṣa vai pratiṣṭhā vaiśvānaraḥ iti saḥ eṣā ugniḥ vaiśvānaraḥ

original: yatpuruṣaḥ sa yo haitamevamagniṃ vaiśvānaram puruṣavidham puruṣe'ntaḥ
analyzed: yat puruṣaḥ sa yaḥ ha etam evam agnim vaiśvānaram puruṣavidham puruṣa intar

original: pratiṣṭhitaṃ vedāpa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyureti na hāsya bruvāṇaṃ cana
analyzed: pratiṣṭhitam veda apa punarmṛtyum jayati sarvam āyuḥ eti na ha asya bruvāṇam cana

original: vaiśvānaro hinasti 10.6.2.[1]
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ hinasti

original: dvayaṃ vā idamattā caivādyaṃ ca tadyadobhayaṃ samāgacatyattaivākhyāyate nādyam 10.6.2.[2]
analyzed: dvayam vai idam attā ca eva adyam ca tat yadā ubhayam samāgacati attā eva ākhyāyate na ādyam

original: sa vai yaḥ so'ttāgnireva saḥ tasminyatkiṃ cābhyādadhatyāhitaya evāsya tā āhitayo ha
analyzed: sa vai yaḥ sottā agniḥ eva saḥ tasmin yat kim ca abhyādadhati āhitayaḥ eva asya tāḥ āhitayaḥ ha

original: vai tā āhutaya ityācakṣate paro'kṣam paro'kṣakāmā hi devāḥ 10.6.2.[3]
analyzed: vai tāḥ āhutayaḥ iti ācakṣate parokṣam parokṣa kāmāḥ hi devāḥ

original: ādityo vā attā tasya candramā evāhitayaścandramasaṃ hyāditya
analyzed: ādityaḥ vai attā tasya candramāḥ eva āhitayaḥ candramasam hi āditya

original: ādadhatītyadhidevatam 10.6.2.[4]
analyzed: ādadhati iti adhidevatam

original: athādhyātmam prāṇo vā attā tasyānnamevāhitayo'nnaṃ hi prāṇa ādadhatīti nvagneḥ 10.6.2.[5]
analyzed: atha adhyātmam prāṇaḥ vai attā tasya annam eva āhitayā unnam hi prāṇe ādadhati iti nu agneḥ

original: athārkasya agnirvā arkastasyāhutaya eva kamāhutayo hyagnaye kam 10.6.2.[6]
analyzed: atha arkasya agniḥ vai arkaḥ tasya āhutayaḥ eva kam āhutayaḥ hi agnaye kam

original: ādityo vā arkaḥ tasya candramā eva kaṃ candramā hyādityāya kamityadhidevatam 10.6.2.[7]
analyzed: ādityaḥ vai arkaḥ tasya candramāḥ eva kam candramāḥ hi ādityāya kam iti adhidevatam

original: athādhyātmam prāṇo vā arkastasyānnameva kamannaṃ hi prāṇāya kamiti
analyzed: atha adhyātmam prāṇaḥ vai arkaḥ tasya annam eva kam annam hi prāṇāya kam iti

original: nvevārkasya 10.6.2.[8]
analyzed: nu eva arkasya

original: athokthasya agnirvā uktasyāhutaya eva thamāhutibhirhyagniruttiṣṭhati 10.6.2.[9]
analyzed: atha ukthasya agniḥ vai uktasya āhutayaḥ eva tham āhutibhiḥ hi agniḥ uttiṣṭhati

original: ādityo vā uk tasya candramā eva thaṃ candramasā hyāditya uttiṣṭhatītyadhidevatam 10.6.2.[10]
analyzed: ādityaḥ vai uc tasya candramāḥ eva tham candramasā hi ādityaḥ uttiṣṭhati iti adhidevatam

original: athādhyātmam prāṇo vā uktasyānnameva thamannena hi prāṇa uttiṣṭhatīti
analyzed: atha adhyātmam prāṇaḥ vai uktasya annam eva tham annena hi prāṇaḥ uttiṣṭhati iti

original: nvevokthasya sa eṣo'gnividho'rkavidha ukthavidho yatpuruṣaḥ sa yo
analyzed: nu eva ukthasya saḥ eṣā ugni vidhā urka vidhaḥ uktha vidhaḥ yat puruṣaḥ sa yaḥ

original: haitamevamagnividhamarkavidhamukthavidham puruṣamupāste viduṣo
analyzed: ha etam evam agni vidham arka vidham uktha vidham puruṣam upāste viduṣaḥ

original: haivāsyaivam bhrātṛvyo mlāyati 10.6.2.[11]
analyzed: ha eva asya evam bhrātṛvyaḥ mlāyati

original: prāṇena vā agnirdīpyate agninā vāyurvāyunāditya ādityena candramāścandramasā
analyzed: prāṇena vai agniḥ dīpyate agninā vāyuḥ vāyunā ādityaḥ ādityena candramāḥ candramasā

original: nakṣatrāṇi nakṣatrairvidyudetāvatī vai dīptirasmiṃśca loke'muṣmiṃśca sarvā haitāṃ
analyzed: nakṣatrāṇi nakṣatraiḥ vidyut etāvatī vai dīptiḥ asmin ca loke imuṣmin ca sarvā ha etām

original: dīptiṃ dīpyate'smiṃśca loke'muṣmiṃśca ya evaṃ veda 10.6.3.[1]
analyzed: dīptim dīpyate ismin ca loke imuṣmin ca yaḥ evam veda

original: satyam brahmetyupāsīta atha khalu kratumayo'yam puruṣaḥ sa
analyzed: satyam brahma iti upāsīta atha khalu kratu mayaḥ yam puruṣaḥ sa

original: yāvatkraturayamasmāllokātpraityevaṃkraturhāmuṃ lokam pretyābhisambhavati 10.6.3.[2]
analyzed: yāvat kratuḥ ayam asmāt lokāt praiti evaṃkratuḥ ha amum lokam pretya abhisambhavati

original: sa ātmānamupāsīta manomayam prāṇaśarīram bhārūpamākāśātmānaṃ
analyzed: saḥ ātmānam upāsīta manaḥ mayam prāṇa śarīram bhā rūpam ākāśa ātmānam

original: kāmarūpiṇam
analyzed: kāmarūpiṇam

original: manojavasaṃ satyasaṃkalpaṃ satyadhṛtiṃ sarvagandhaṃ sarvarasaṃ sarvā anu diśaḥ
analyzed: manaḥ javasam satya saṃkalpam satya dhṛtim sarva gandham sarva rasam sarvāḥ anu diśaḥ

original: prabhūtaṃ sarvamidamabhyāptamavākkamanādaraṃ yathā vrīhirvā yavo vā śyāmāko
analyzed: prabhūtam sarvam idam abhyāptam avākkam anādaram yathā vrīhiḥ vā yavaḥ vā

original: vā śyāmākataṇḍulo vaivamayamantarātmanpuruṣo hiraṇmayo yathā
analyzed: vā śyāmāka taṇḍulaḥ vā evam ayam antarātman puruṣaḥ hiraṇmayaḥ yathā

original: jyotiradhūmamevaṃ jyāyāndivo jyāyānākāśājjyāyānasyai pṛthivyai jyāyāntsarvebhyo
analyzed: jyotiḥ a dhūmam evam jyāyān divaḥ jyāyān ākāśāt jyāyān asyai pṛthivyai jyāyān sarvebhyaḥ

original: bhūtebhyaḥ sa prāṇasyātmaiṣa ma ātmaitamita ātmānam pretyābhisambhaviṣyāmīti
analyzed: bhūtebhyaḥ sa prāṇasya ātmā eṣa me ātmā etam itas ātmānam pretya abhisambhaviṣyāmi iti

original: yasya syādaddhā na vicikitsāstīti ha smāha śāṇḍilya evametaditi 10.6.4.[1]
analyzed: yasya syāt addhā na vicikitsā asti iti ha sma āha śāṇḍilyaḥ evam etat iti

original: uṣā vā aśvasya medhyasya śiraḥ sūryaścakṣurvātaḥ prāṇo vyāttamagnirvaiśvānaraḥ
analyzed: uṣāḥ vai aśvasya medhyasya śiraḥ sūryaḥ cakṣuḥ vātaḥ prāṇaḥ vyāttam agniḥ vaiśvānaraḥ

original: saṃvatsara ātmāśvasya medhyasya dyauṣpṛṣṭhamantarikṣamudaram pṛthivī
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ ātmā aśvasya medhyasya dyauḥ pṛṣṭham antarikṣam udaram pṛthivī

original: pājasyaṃ diśaḥ pārśve avāntaradiśaḥ parśava ṛtavo'ṅgāni māsāścārdhamāsāśca
analyzed: pājasyam diśaḥ pārśve avāntaradiśaḥ parśavaḥ ṛtavaḥ oṅgāni māsāḥ ca ardha māsāḥ ca

original: parvāṇyahorātrāṇi pratiṣṭhā nakṣatrāṇyasthīni nabho māṃsānyūvadhyaṃ sikatāḥ
analyzed: parvāṇi ahar rātrāṇi pratiṣṭhāḥ nakṣatrāṇi asthīni nabhaḥ māṃsāni ūvadhyam sikatāḥ

original: sindhavo gudā yakṛcca klomānaśca parvatā oṣadhayaśca vanaspatayaśca
analyzed: sindhavaḥ gudāḥ yakṛt ca klomānaḥ ca parvatāḥ oṣadhayaḥ ca vanaspatayaḥ ca

original: lomānyudyanpūrvārdho nimlocanjaghanārdho yadvijṛmbhate tadvidyotate
analyzed: lomāni udyan pūrva ardhaḥ nimlocan jaghana ardhaḥ yat vijṛmbhate tat vidyotate

original: yadvidhūnute tatstanayati yanmehati tadvarṣati vāgevāsya vāgaharvā aśvam
analyzed: yat vidhūnute tat stanayati yat mehati tat varṣati vāc eva asya vāc ahar vai aśvam

original: purastānmahimānvajāyata tasya pūrve samudre yonīrātrirenam
analyzed: purastāt mahimā anvajāyata tasya pūrve samudre yonīrātriḥ enam

original: paścānmahimānvajāyata tasyāpare samudre yoniretau vā aśvam mahimānāvabhitaḥ
analyzed: paścāt mahimā anvajāyata tasya apare samudre yoniḥ etau vai aśvam mahimānau abhitas

original: sambabhūvaturhayo bhūtvā devānavahadvājī gandharvānarvāsurānaśvo
analyzed: sambabhūvatuḥ hayaḥ bhūtvā devān avahat vājī gandharvān arva asurān aśvaḥ

original: manuṣyāntsamudra evāsya bandhuḥ samudro yoniḥ 10.6.5.[1]
analyzed: manuṣyān samudraḥ eva asya bandhuḥ samudraḥ yoniḥ

original: naiveha kiṃ canāgra āsīt mṛtyunaivedamāvṛtamāsīdaśanāyayāśanāyā hi
analyzed: na eva iha kim cana agre āsīt mṛtyunā eva idam āvṛtam āsīt aśanāyayā aśanāyā hi

original: mṛtyustanmano'kurutātmanvī syāmiti so'rcannacarattasyārcata āpo'jāyantārcate vai
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ tat manaḥ kuruta ātmanvī syām iti saḥ ūrcan acarat tasya arcataḥ āpaḥ jāyanta arcate vai

original: me kamabhūditi tadevārkyasyārkatvaṃ kaṃ ha vā asmai bhavati ya
analyzed: me kam abhūt iti tat eva arkyasya arka tvam kam ha vai asmai bhavati yaḥ

original: evametadarkyasyārkatvaṃ veda 10.6.5.[2]
analyzed: evam etat arkyasya arka tvam veda

original: āpo vā arkaḥ tadyadapāṃ śara āsīttatsamahanyata sā
analyzed: āpaḥ vai arkaḥ tat yat apām śaraḥ āsīt tat samahanyata sā

original: pṛthivyabhavattasyāmaśrāmyattasya śrāntasya taptasya tejo raso niravartatāgniḥ 10.6.5.[3]
analyzed: pṛthivī abhavat tasyām aśrāmyat tasya śrāntasya taptasya tejaḥ rasaḥ niravartata agniḥ

original: sa tredhātmānaṃ vyakuruta ādityaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vāyuṃ tṛtīyaṃ sa eṣa
analyzed: sa tredhā ātmānam vyakuruta ādityam tṛtīyam vāyum tṛtīyam saḥ eṣa

original: prāṇastredhāvihitastasya prācī dikśiro'sau cāsau cermāvathāsya pratīcī dikpucamasau
analyzed: prāṇaḥ tredhā vihitaḥ tasya prācī diś śiraḥ usau ca asau ca irmau atha asya pratīcī diś pucamasau

original: cāsau ca sakthyau dakṣiṇā codīcī ca pārśve
analyzed: ca asau ca sakthyau dakṣiṇā ca udīcī ca pārśve

original: dyauṣpṛṣṭhamantarikṣamudaramiyamuraḥ sa eṣo'psu pratiṣṭhito yatra kva caiti
analyzed: dyauḥ pṛṣṭham antarikṣam udaram iyam uraḥ saḥ eṣā upsu pratiṣṭhitaḥ yatra kva ca eti

original: tadeva pratitiṣṭhatyevaṃ vidvān 10.6.5.[4]
analyzed: tat eva pratitiṣṭhati evam vidvān

original: so'kāmayata dvitīyo ma ātmā jāyeteti sa manasā vācam mithunaṃ
analyzed: saḥ u kāmayata dvitīyaḥ me ātmā jāyeta iti sa manasā vācam mithunam

original: samabhavadaśanāyām mṛtyustadyadreta āsītsa saṃvatsaro'bhavanna ha purā tataḥ
analyzed: samabhavat aśanāyām mṛtyuḥ tat yat retaḥ āsīt sa saṃvatsaraḥ bhavat na ha purā tatas

original: saṃvatsara āsa tametāvantaṃ kālamabibharyāvāntsaṃvatsarastametāvataḥ kālasya
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ āsa tam etāvantam kālam abibhar yāvān saṃvatsaraḥ tam etāvataḥ kālasya

original: parastādasṛjata taṃ jātamabhivyādadātsa bhāṇakarotsaiva vāgabhavat 10.6.5.[5]
analyzed: parastāt asṛjata tam jātam abhivyādadāt sa bhāṇakarot sā eva vāc abhavat

original: sa aikṣata yadi vā imamabhimaṃsye kanīyo'nnaṃ kariṣya iti sa tayā vācā
analyzed: sa aikṣata yadi vai imam abhimaṃsye kanīya unnam kariṣye iti sa tayā vācā

original: tenātmanedaṃ sarvamasṛjata yadidaṃ kiṃ carco yajūṃṣi sāmāni candāṃsi
analyzed: tena ātmanā idam sarvam asṛjata yat idam kim ca ṛcaḥ yajūṃṣi sāmāni candāṃsi

original: yajñānprajām paśūntsa yadyadevāsṛjata tattadattumadhriyata sarvaṃ vā attīti
analyzed: yajñān prajām paśūn sa yat yat eva asṛjata tat tat attum adhriyata sarvam vai atti iti

original: tadaditeradititvaṃ sarvasyāttā bhavati sarvamasyānnam bhavati ya
analyzed: tat aditeḥ aditi tvam sarvasya attā bhavati sarvam asya annam bhavati yaḥ

original: evametadaditeradititvaṃ veda 10.6.5.[6]
analyzed: evam etat aditeḥ aditi tvam veda

original: so'kāmayata bhūyasā yajñena bhūyo yajeyeti so'śrāmyatsa tapo'tapyata tasya śrāntasya
analyzed: sā ukāmayata bhūyasā yajñena bhūyaḥ yajeya iti sā śrāmyat sa tapaḥ utapyata tasya śrāntasya

original: taptasya yaśo vīryamudakrāmatprāṇā vai yaśo vīryaṃ tatprāṇeṣūtkrānteṣu śarīraṃ
analyzed: taptasya yaśaḥ vīryam udakrāmat prāṇāḥ vai yaśaḥ vīryam tat prāṇeṣu utkrānteṣu śarīram

original: śvayitumadhriyata tasya śarīra eva mana āsīt 10.6.5.[7]
analyzed: śvayitum adhriyata tasya śarīre eva manaḥ āsīt

original: so'kāmayata medhyaṃ ma idaṃ syādātmanvyanena syāmiti tato'śvaḥ
analyzed: sā ukāmayata medhyam me idam syāt ātmanvī anena syām iti tatas uśvaḥ

original: samabhavadyadaśvattanmedhyamabhūditi tadevāśvamedhasyāśvamedhatvameṣa ha
analyzed: samabhavat yat aśvattat medhyam abhūt iti tat eva aśvamedhasya aśvamedha tvam eṣa ha

original: vā aśvamedhaṃ veda ya enamevaṃ veda 10.6.5.[8]
analyzed: vai aśvamedham veda yaḥ enam evam veda

original: tamanavarudhyevāmanyata taṃ saṃvatsarasya parastādātmana ālabhata
analyzed: tam an avarudhya iva amanyata tam saṃvatsarasya parastāt ātmanaḥ ālabhata

original: paśūndevatābhyaḥ pratyauhattasam:
analyzed: paśūn devatābhyaḥ pratyauhattasam

original: tsarvadevatyam prokṣitam prājāpatyamālabhanta
analyzed: t sarva devatyam prokṣitam prājāpatyam ālabhanta

original: eṣa vā aśvamedho ya eṣa tapati tasya saṃvatsara ātmāyamagnirarkastasyeme lokā
analyzed: eṣa vai aśvamedhaḥ yaḥ eṣa tapati tasya saṃvatsaraḥ ātmā ayam agniḥ arkaḥ tasya ime lokāḥ

original: ātmānastāvetāvarkāmedhau so punarekaiva devatā bhavati mṛtyurevāpa punarmṛtyuṃ
analyzed: ātmānaḥ tau etau arka amedhau sā u punar ekā eva devatā bhavati mṛtyuḥ eva āpa punar mṛtyum

original: jayati nainam mṛtyurāpnoti mṛtyurasyātmā bhavati sarvamāyuretyetāsāṃ
analyzed: jayati na enam mṛtyuḥ āpnoti mṛtyuḥ asya ātmā bhavati sarvam āyuḥ eti etāsām

original: devatānāmeko bhavati ya evaṃ veda 10.6.5.[9]
analyzed: devatānām ekaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: atha vaṃśaḥ samānamā sāṃjīvīputrātsāṃjīvīputro
analyzed: atha vaṃśaḥ samānam ā sāṃjīvīputrāt sāṃjīvīputraḥ

original: māṇḍūkāyanermāṇḍūkāyanirmāṇḍavyānmāṇḍavyaḥ kautsātkautso
analyzed: māṇḍūkāyaneḥ māṇḍūkāyaniḥ māṇḍavyāt māṇḍavyaḥ kautsāt kautsaḥ

original: māhitthermāhitthirvāmakakṣāyaṇādvāmakakṣāyaṇo vātsyādvātsyaḥ
analyzed: māhittheḥ māhitthiḥ vāmakakṣāyaṇāt vāmakakṣāyaṇaḥ vātsyāt vātsyaḥ

original: śāṇḍilyācāṇḍilyaḥ
analyzed: śāṇḍilya ācāṇḍilyaḥ

original: kuśreḥ kuśriryajñavacaso rājastambāyanādyajñavacā
analyzed: kuśreḥ kuśriḥ yajñavacasaḥ rājastambāyanāt yajñavacā

original: rājastambāyanasturātkāvaṣeyātturaḥ kāvaṣeyaḥ prajāpateḥ prajāpatirbrahmaṇo
analyzed: rājastambāyanaḥ turāt kāvaṣeyāt turaḥ kāvaṣeyaḥ prajāpateḥ prajāpatiḥ brahmaṇaḥ

original: brahma svayambhu brahmaṇe namaḥ
analyzed: brahma svayambhu brahmaṇe namaḥ
